name: That One Visa
description:
You are a starving game dev and you are trying to get a working Visa to stay in the US. You have 28 weeks until submitting the Visa application...

---

This is a game that I worked on during Global Game Jam 2019. This game also received Best Impact Award at the NYU Game Center jam site.

Art/Programming/Writing: Kelly Chang

Additional writing: Pratik Jain
